---
title: "Schedule"
execute:
  freeze: false
---

Subject to change depending on how quickly we progress through course content.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(readxl)
library(gt)

read_excel("schedule.xlsx") |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(PREP, SLIDES, ACTIVITIES, DUE)
    ) |>
  cols_width(
    WEEK ~ px(45),
    DATE ~ px(100),
    PREP ~ px(250),
    SLIDES ~ px(250),
    ACTIVITIES ~ px(150),
    DUE ~ px(150)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", columns = c(WEEK, DATE)
  ) |>
  tab_options(table.font.size = 13) |>
  opt_row_striping() |>
  sub_missing(columns = everything(),
              missing_text = "") 
  
```
